roleset.name: relating to new abnormal tissue growth (e.g. tumor)

example.name: arg1
example.text: In addition he has a very large liver lesion which may be cystic in nature but could be neoplastic , and Dr. Anderson will see him for this on Monday .

roleset.note: NEOPLASTIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8 (from neoplastic.01-j)
